bug.author: shantanuchhabra
bug.summary: Drawing Classifier `evaluate` API docs need to be re-formatted
bug.description:
See <denchmark-link:https://apple.github.io/turicreate/docs/api/drawing_classifier.html?highlight=drawing#turicreate.toolkits.drawing_classifier.DrawingClassifier.evaluate>https://apple.github.io/turicreate/docs/api/drawing_classifier.html?highlight=drawing#turicreate.toolkits.drawing_classifier.DrawingClassifier.evaluate</denchmark-link>
We expect something like this: <denchmark-link:https://apple.github.io/turicreate/docs/api/generated/turicreate.activity_classifier.ActivityClassifier.evaluate.html#turicreate.activity_classifier.ActivityClassifier.evaluate>https://apple.github.io/turicreate/docs/api/generated/turicreate.activity_classifier.ActivityClassifier.evaluate.html#turicreate.activity_classifier.ActivityClassifier.evaluate</denchmark-link>
